body_html:
If you ran any sudo command in your virtualenv, the owner of some of the files will be root.
You will probably chmod all of your virtual environment, or create a new one.

Closing as this is an issue with user setup, not a TF bug.
body_text:
If you ran any sudo command in your virtualenv, the owner of some of the files will be root.
You will probably chmod all of your virtual environment, or create a new one.
Closing as this is an issue with user setup, not a TF bug.
body:
If you ran any sudo command in your virtualenv, the owner of some of the files will be root.
You will probably chmod all of your virtual environment, or create a new one.

Closing as this is an issue with user setup, not a TF bug.
